description.value:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.chmQgMamyaZX90Tc]{Magical Edification}

Youâ€™ve continued to expand your compendium of tools to compile knowledge. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vTQvfYu2llKQedmY]{Comprehend Language}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.D442XMADp01qJ7Cs]{Mindlink}, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VVAZPCvd4d90qVA1]{Secret Page} as innate occult spells, each once per day. When you cast secret page, it is automatically heightened to the same spell level as your cantrips from Magical Edification.
